dataset_id: LBA-ECO LC-10 Landsat TM Data for Legal Amazon: 1986-1994
title: LBA-ECO LC-10 Landsat TM Data for Legal Amazon: 1986-1994
summary: This data set includes Landsat TM scenes from across the Legal Amazon region.  A single image is provided for each spatial tile, representing the most cloud-free retrieval from 9/21/86 to 9/17/94.  All files are in a single directory, including one band-sequential (bsq) file and one database (ddr) file for each scene.
